p:
The 30 days grown in vitro plantlets were used as source of explant. The stem explant (1 cm) was used for maximum callus biomass production as previously optimized by our research group
2 . Briefly, MS media fortified with sucrose (30 g/L), agar (8 g/L) and Thidiazuron (4.4 µM) with PH (5.5–5.7) was employed for inoculation of explants. The cultures maintained in conditions of (16L/8D hours) light and temperature 25 °C.
